meta.title: Sahana Nagendra Hosamani
meta.description: Portfolio website showcasing software engineering work and technical expertise

about.bio: Results-driven Software Engineer with over 3 years of experience at Cognizant, specializing in full-stack development, API design, and automated testing. Proficient in Python, Angular, Django, and JavaScript, with a proven track record of boosting operational efficiency by 30% through innovative solutions. Skilled in Agile methodologies, CI/CD pipelines, and cross-functional collaboration. Currently pursuing a Masters in Computer Science at Oregon State University, eager to leverage technical expertise to deliver high-impact software solutions in a dynamic environment.
focus: Designing and implementing REST APIs for seamless system communication
Developing full-stack applications with optimized performance
Implementing CI/CD pipelines and automated testing frameworks
Collaborating with cross-functional teams in Agile environments

experience.title: Software Engineer Associate
experience.description: Developed and deployed full-stack applications, designed REST APIs, and optimized database queries. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions using Agile methodologies, achieving significant improvements in user engagement and system performance.
achievements: Developed full-stack applications using Python, Django, Angular, and JavaScript, improving user engagement by 20%
Designed and tested REST APIs, reducing response times by 15% through optimized endpoints
Executed unit and integration tests using Pytest, achieving 90% test coverage and reducing defects by 10%
Optimized SQL queries in MySQL, cutting execution time by 25% for data-driven insights
Coordinated with teams to deliver comprehensive API documentation, accelerating project delivery by 15%

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description: Led the development of a full-stack inventory management system, implemented CI/CD pipelines, and built data visualization dashboards. Mentored interns and ensured seamless project delivery through Agile sprints and detailed documentation.
achievements: Developed inventory management system using Python, JavaScript, and MongoDB, increasing operational efficiency by 30%
Engineered optimized algorithms for real-time data processing, reducing system latency by 25%
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Ansible, achieving 95% test coverage with Pytest
Built data visualization dashboards using React and D3.js for inventory forecasting
Mentored 3 interns in Agile sprints, delivering training on Git and code quality

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science

certifications.name: Agile Fundamentals: Including Scrum and Kanban

publications.title: Hash Cracker Web App
publications.shortDescription: Full-stack web application to reverse engineer SHA-256 hashes, deployed on AWS with CI/CD pipelines.
description: Developed a full-stack web application using React.js and Node.js to reverse engineer SHA-256 hashes.
Integrated CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins for automated testing and deployment.
Deployed the application on AWS Elastic Beanstalk with Swagger API documentation for enhanced accessibility.
publications.impact: Provided a tool for secure hash analysis with automated deployment workflows

publications.title: Identification of hate material in code-mixed social media data using demographic and contextual information
publications.shortDescription: NLP research on detecting Hinglish hate speech using demographic and contextual analysis with custom embeddings.
description: Conducted research to detect hate speech in code-mixed Hindi-English (Hinglish) social media content.
Established lexical baselines using advanced NLP algorithms and custom embeddings for accurate detection.
Integrated demographic and contextual information to distinguish hate speech from general profanity.
features: Advanced NLP algorithms for hate speech detection
publications.impact: Enhanced social media safety through improved hate speech detection

publications.title: IndiaStack API for educational institutions
publications.shortDescription: MERN stack web and mobile apps integrating Digilocker API to streamline educational admissions.
description: Developed a MERN stack web application and mobile apps using Swift and Java to integrate IndiaStack's Digilocker API.
Streamlined admission processes for educational institutions by digitizing document verification.
Ensured cross-platform accessibility with secure document storage and real-time application tracking.
features: Digilocker API integration for document verification
Cross-platform mobile apps for iOS and Android
publications.impact: Reduced admission processing time by 60% for educational institutions
